FOUND IN: Bayreuth - This is the most famous site of an annual Wagner festival, as it is the location of the Bayreuth Festival, which has been held every year since 1876 and features performances of Wagner's operas.

CLUE: (Of computer memory) able to be read in non-sequential order
FOUND IN: Random Access Memory (RAM) - A type of computer memory that can be read in any order, rather than being stored in a particular sequence.
